parameters.fake_last_name: an auto-generated fake last name; character
parameters.payor_group: Payor associated with order, levels: commercial, government, unassigned, medical assistance, self pay, charity care, other; type: character
parameters.result: result of test, levels: positive, negative, invalid; type: character
parameters.demo_group: patient group, levels: patient, misc_adult, client, other adult, unidentified; type: character
parameters.drive_thru_ind: Whether the specimen was collected via a drive-thru site, levels: 1: Collected at drive-thru site; 0: Not collected at drive-thru site; type: numeric
parameters.age: Age of subject at time of specimen collection (Anonymized), units = years; type: numeric
parameters.rec_ver_tat: Time elapsed between receive time and verification time, range: -18.6 - 218.2, units = hours; type: numeric
parameters.clinic_name: Clinic or ward where the specimen was collected, 88 levels; type: character
parameters.orderset: Whether an order set was used for test order, levels: 1: Collected via orderset; 0: Not collected via orderset; numeric
parameters.pan_day: day after start of pandemic; type: numeric
parameters.test_id: test that was performed, levels: covid, xcvd1; type: character
parameters.gender: anonymized Gender, levels: female, male; type: character
parameters.patient_class: Disposition of subject at time of collection, levels: inpatient, emergency, observation, recurring outpatient, outpatient, not applicable, day surgery, admit after surgery-obs, admit after surgery-ip; type: character
parameters.col_rec_tat: Time elapsed between collect time and receive time, range: 0 - 61370.2, units = hours; type: numeric
parameters.subject_id: id number for each subject; type: numeric
parameters.ct_result: Cycle at which threshold reached during PCR, range: 14.05-45; type: numeric
parameters.fake_first_name: an auto-generated fake first name; type: character

description:
Description
A dataset containing details of SARS-CoV-2 testing in 2020 at CHOP
title: Deidentified Results of COVID-19 testing at the Children's Hospital of Pennsylvania (CHOP) in 2020
reference: Data on testing for SARS-CoV2 from days 4-107 of the COVID pandemic in 2020. CHOP is a pediatric hospital in Philadelphia, Pennsylvania, USA. These data have been anonymized, time-shifted, and permuted.
format: A data frame with 15524 observations and 17 variables
